specialRules.hint: The hero and its unit may move by up to 3” after shooting.
specialRules.name: Art of War

specialRules.hint: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if they are deployed within 6” of this model.

specialRules.hint: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 24”. Next time that a friendly unit shoots at it, that units gets +1 to its hit rolls.
specialRules.name: Targeting Array
specialRules.label: Targeting Array
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 24”. Next time that a friendly unit shoots at it, that units gets +1 to its hit rolls.

specialRules.hint: Once per activation before attacking place this model anywhere within 6”.
specialRules.name: Teleport
specialRules.label: Teleport
specialRules.description: Once per activation before attacking place this model anywhere within 6”.

spells.name: Weaken Soul
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -2 to its next morale test.

spells.name: Dragon Breath
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Eternal Guidance
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 18” must take a morale test. If passed it gets +2 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Mind Challenge
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” must take a morale test. If failed it takes 4 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Spirit Wind
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” must take a morale test. If passed, it may immediately move by up to 12”.

spells.name: Spirit Vortex
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 hit per model.
